org.cougaar.planning.ldm.trigger
Interface TriggerAction

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
TriggerAlertAction, TriggerMakeStaleAction, TriggerMakeTaskAction, TriggerRescindAction
public interface TriggerAction
extends java.io.Serializable

A TriggerAction performs an action (presumed to be publishing changes to the LDM) when 'fired'.

Method Summary
 void Perform(java.lang.Object[] objects, PluginDelegate pid)
           
 

Method Detail

Perform

             PluginDelegate pid)
Parameters:
objects - The objects to perform the action against.
pid - The plugin delegate to allow things like publish add/remove/change and getClusterObjectFactory
